tasks.name: Defrost
tasks.description: Power off your freezer and let the ice build up melt.

tasks.name: Clean condenser coils
tasks.description: Vacuum or wipe dust and debris from the condensor coils.

tasks.name: Check door gasket
tasks.description: Clean food residue off the door gasket and make sure it's tight.

tasks.name: Change ice maker filter
tasks.description: Change the water filter in your ice maker.

tasks.name: Change water dispenser filter
tasks.description: Change the water filter in your water dispenser.

tasks.name: Clean under the hood
tasks.description: Lift the cooktop to clean any food particles or grease buildup beneath it.

tasks.name: Wash burner drip plates
tasks.description: Remove and wash burner drip plates, or replace them if they are corroded.

tasks.name: Clean knobs
tasks.description: Remove control panel knobs and clean around the bases.

tasks.name: Clean
tasks.description: Inspect gutters for debris and remove.

tasks.name: Inspect for leaks
tasks.description: Check gutters for leaks and repair.

tasks.name: Clean showerhead
tasks.description: Clean showerheads to remove mineral deposits.

tasks.name: Inspect drain
tasks.description: Inspect the drain for clogs or buildup and remove.

tasks.name: Descale
tasks.description: Run a cleaning solution through your hot water heater to clean mineral deposits.

tasks.name: Check for leaks
tasks.description: Inspect for leaking water or signs of moisture around the unit.

tasks.name: Check shingles
tasks.description: Check for missing, curling, or cracking shingles and replace.

tasks.name: Clean
tasks.description: Clean off dirt, mildew, stains, and other elements.

tasks.name: Check shingles
tasks.description: Check for missing, curling, or cracking shingles and replace.

tasks.name: Clean trap
tasks.description: Remove and clean the trap in the bottom of your dishwasher.

tasks.name: Sanitize
tasks.description: Put vinegar or cleaning solution in and run a hot water cycle to sanitize and deodorize.

tasks.name: Clean sprayer arm
tasks.description: Check holes in sprayer arms for debris and dried soap and clean if needed.

tasks.name: Wash
tasks.description: Wash off any moss, mold, mildew, or grit that has accumulated.

tasks.name: Wash
tasks.description: Use a siding cleaning kit to wash off any moss, mold, mildew, or grit on the siding.

tasks.name: Wash
tasks.description: Spray deck with a cleaning solution and scrub it.

tasks.name: Drain
tasks.description: Drain your boiler to clear out sediment.

tasks.name: Clean compressor
tasks.description: Clean and service A/C compressor.

tasks.name: Clean furnace
tasks.description: Clean and service furnace.

tasks.name: Change filters
tasks.description: Change return vent filters.

tasks.name: Clean vents
tasks.description: Remove vents and wash off any dirt, grime, or mold.

tasks.name: Test
tasks.description: Test smoke alarm and replace batteries if it's not functioning.

tasks.name: Vacuum dust
tasks.description: Vacuum dust off of the smoke alarm to prevent false alarms and ensure proper functioning.

tasks.name: Replace batteries
tasks.description: Replace batteries (even if they are still working).

tasks.name: Replace
tasks.description: Buy and install new alarms.

tasks.name: Test
tasks.description: Test detector and replace batteries if it's not functioning.

tasks.name: Vacuum dust
tasks.description: Vacuum dust off of the detector to prevent false alarms and ensure proper functioning.

tasks.name: Replace batteries
tasks.description: Replace batteries (even if they are still working).

tasks.name: Replace
tasks.description: Buy and install new detectors.

tasks.name: Clean valves
tasks.description: Look for clogs and clean the valves.

tasks.name: Winterize
tasks.description: Turn off the water supply and drain water from the system.

tasks.name: Clean exhaust vent
tasks.description: Inspect and clean exhaust vent.

tasks.name: Clean exterior vent cap
tasks.description: Remove any debris from the exterior vent cap.

tasks.name: Winterize
tasks.description: Drain, shut off, and cover outdoor faucets.

tasks.name: Clean
tasks.description: Clean off any dust or particles that have accumalted on the fan and fan cover.

tasks.name: Clean filter
tasks.description: For metal filters, remove and clean. For charcoal filters, inspect and replace if needed.

tasks.name: Clean exterior
tasks.description: Clean the exterior with spray or degreaser.

tasks.name: Flush tank
tasks.description: Flush tank to remove sediment.

tasks.name: Check pressure valve
tasks.description: Test the temperature and pressure release valve

tasks.name: Inspect hoses
tasks.description: Make sure there are no bulges or cracks in the hoses; replace if needed.

tasks.name: Clean
tasks.description: Wipe down the door, gasket, and drum.
